cause.description:
The IFOPA is a nonprofit organization committed to creating a future without FOP. This organization supports families dealing with a rare genetic condition known as Fibrodysplasia Ossificans Progressiva (FOP). Simply stated, FOP causes muscles and other connective tissue to turn into bone, eventually causing immobility as FOP bone fuses joints. For more information, check out the website: www.ifopa.org.
1. RESEARCH, the key to a treatment and cure.
2. EDUCATION, the key to preventing misdiagnosis and finding more FOP families.
3. ADVOCACY, the key to living independently with full equality
4. HOPE, the key to support, survival and community.
5. CURE, the key to a better future for those with FOP & the people who love them.
cause.mission: The IFOPA's mission is to advance and support the Five Keys to a future without FOP.
cause.name: IFOPA - International Fibrodysplasia Ossificans Progressiva Association
